section.p: You can leave possessions and money here to save having to carry them around with you. You can also rest here safely, and recover any Stamina points you have lost. Record in the box anything you wish to leave. Each time you return, :

outcomes.outcome: A thief. All the money you left here has gone

Earthquake!
Lose all possessions you left here
and the town house (erase the tick at 100)
